reply: The biggest Deep Purple thing I can imagine would be a cosmic, swirling nebula of interstellar dust and gas, spanning light-years across the galaxy. Its core would burn with the intensity of a thousand suns, radiating a profound, resonant "Smoke on the Water" riff that echoes through the void, shaping new star systems and inspiring nascent civilizations with its sheer, unadulterated rock power. It's the ultimate manifestation of their sound â€“ vast, powerful, and eternally influential.
